Name:
USS Buchanan
HMS Campbeltown
Fate:
Transferred to United Kingdom 9 September 1940
Expended as demolition ship during St. Nazaire Raid. Destroyed 29 March 1942.
Draft:
9 ft 0 in (2.7 m) (light) 
12 ft 0 in (3.7 m) (full load)
Propulsion:
4 × Normand return-flame boilers
Brown-Curtis single reduction geared turbines
30,000 shp (22,371 kW), 2 shafts
Armament:
4 × 4 in (102 mm) guns
1 × 3 in (76 mm) guns
2 × 3 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes (as built)
